wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(14665132061564741) ,p_plug_name=>'Project Details' ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_component_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>10 ,p_include_in_reg_disp_sel_yn=>'Y' ,p_plug_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'DECLARE', ' projectTitle varchar2(100);', ' projectDescription varchar2(500);', ' projectDateStarted date;', ' projectDateEnded date;', ' netValue number(6,2);', 'BEGIN', ' -- Multiple values with INTO is special: https://www.oracletutorial.com/plsql-tutorial/plsql-select-into/', ' SELECT p.title, p.description, p.datestarted, p.dateended', ' INTO projectTitle, projectDescription, projectDateStarted, projectDateEnded ', ' FROM bsa_project p', ' WHERE id = :P3_PROJECT_ID;', ' -- Now format and print to the screen using the htp package', ' htp.header(2, projectTitle);', ' htp.header(3, projectDescription);', ' htp.header(4, ''Date Started: '' || projectDateStarted);', ' htp.header(4, ''Date Ended: '' || projectDateEnded);', ' netValue := PU.BSA_FUNC_CALCULATE_NET_PROJECT_VALUE(:P3_PROJECT_ID);', ' if netValue < 0 then', ' -- Set color to red', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, ''style="color:red"'');', ' htp.p(''Net value: -$'' || netValue * -1);', ' else ', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, ''style="color:green"'');', ' htp.p(''Net value: $'' || netValue);', ' end if;', 'END;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' );
